item.title: Shader Tool (MSc)
item.description:
It’s a shader tool developed as final project for my Master degree in Computer Science for Game Development at the Hull University in the UK.

I implemented a DirectX 12 renderer in C++ and used a Dear Imgui plugin to handle the node graph viewport.

Using this tool, the user can run HLSL shaders and tweak the input params to visualize the result.
